answers.answer: I'm not expecting twins but for some reason i watched this one hour video on developing twins in the womb on YouTube. It was very educational and cool. I think it was almost 2 hours long but it was interesting even though I'm only expecting just one lol. Good luck
Congratulations! May God bless you and your little ones!

my friend just had twin boys. She was diagnosed with preeclampsia at 32 weeks and had them at 34. They are seriously the most precious things and she said its an amazing experience. They go to thr bathroom. Eat. cry. Everything at the same time. Good luck momma. Ill pray for you and babies
Thank you all ladies. I really appreciate it. I hope my twins do everything at the same time so I do have to go one behind the other lol

question: I thought I'd share the good news! I made a post last month about vanishing twin syndrome and how I was afraid that I'd lose one of my babies before the visit. Well I went for my visit today and they confirmed I am 11W4D with twins! My little munchkins are growing healthy and developing right on track. One twin however was very feisty moving all over the place. The other twin was very laid back lol. Unfortunately though, I lost 10 pounds and was told I had to gain AT LEAST 40 throughout the pregnancy. They also told me that it is a possibility that I may or may not be put on bed rest in May, which ***** because my college graduation is in May, please pray for me ladies. I just wanted to share the news. Now off to FINALLY tell my mom I'm pregnant lol
title: First Prenatal Visit Today
